detaileddescription.para: Traceability - SWR and SWDD The traceability between SWR and SWDD (model and implementation) is established on SW unit and function/code level by requirements identifier links. OBDLocking is composed of only one unit, namely OBDLocking.c, which satisfies all requirements allocated to OBDLocking within SWA. see "Requirements traceability" in SWA at the following location in Enterprise Architect: VW_ICAS1.Chorus.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ComplexDeviceDrivers.UDS_Service_Chorus.SW Architecture.OBDLocking

Traceability - SWA and SWDD The traceability between SWA and SWDD is established by using an identical component name. Traceability - SWDD and Implementation The traceability between SWDD and implementation is established by using identical sw unit names (in SWDD and implementation).
